snippet.title: Rip Cord (1979 Arcade Game)
snippet.description:
Rip Cord is a black-and-white arcade game made by Exidy in 1979. The gameplay is simple: attempt to land the parachutist on one of the marked targets at the bottom of the screen. While doing this, you must first pull your rip cord and then attempt to maneuver around the various on-screen obstacles. Thanks to the president of Exidy, H.R. Kaufmann, the game ROM has been placed on the official MAME website for free download (personal non-profit use only): 

http://mamedev.org/roms/ripcord/
